transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, Anupam baat kar raha hu company se.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Suniye na, mujhe actually matlab wo weekly jo lead hai na, wo kitna consume mere team ne kiya aur kitna balance jo hai wo kahan se check karenge?
Executive: Haan, wo aap kahan se check karenge? IndiaMART open kar lijiye.
Customer: Hmm hmm, kar liya.
Executive: Ek minute. IndiaMART open kar lijiye. IndiaMART mein sir, by lead pe aa gaye?
Customer: By lead pe aa gaye.
Haan. Haan, ab by lead mein dekhiye sir, haan. Ab by lead mein jaise hi aap right side mein dekhiye sir, balance ka option aa raha hoga.
Executive: Nahi, upar by lead mein by lead mein agar main click kiya. Ahh. Kahan pe? Green colour mein?
Executive: Haan, past lead likha hoga. Aur phir uske neeche, ek minute main dekh leti hu.
Customer: Haan, ek bar login karo na exactly kahan par hai.
Executive: Balance ka option hai to sir by lead pe aapne click kiya? Aap phone mein dekh rahe ho, desktop pe dekh rahe ho?
Customer: Desktop pe.
Executive: Desktop pe dekho na, right side mein buyer profile hai green jahan by lead dikhti hai na aapko contact buyer now dikhta hai jahan pe. Wahin pe dekho na uski just bagal mein buyer profile, balance, help, past lead.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Green colour mein.
Customer: Wo kya profile mein view profile mein jaake karna hoga?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi. Aap by lead wale section pe aa gaye?
Customer: Haan, upar mein lead manager uske bagal mein ye hai, hai na? Theek hai. Lead manager ke bagal mein jo by lead hai usme main click karta hu.
Executive: Click kar diya? Haan. Phir jaise aap dekho na right side mein neeche ki side dekho. Neeche ki side dekho.
Executive: Past lead, buyer profile, balance green colour mein likha hai. Help.
Customer: Achha, usme dekho more lead statistics, past transaction ye sab dikha raha hai. 
Executive: Uske neeche, neeche past transaction just neeche dekho aap bottom mein.
Customer: Usme dikha raha hai more filter karke wo kuch diya hua hai.
Executive: Neeche dekhna hai sir, past transaction yahan likha hai na uske neeche dekho aap.
Customer: Past lead buyer profile.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Buyer profile. Ek bar aap aa sakte hai screen pe?
Executive: Aap kahan dekh rahe ho? Aap sabse neeche bottom line kahan hoti hai sir aap mujhe ye batao. Sabse neeche wali line ko bolte hai na bottom.
Customer: Haan, ruko ruko ruko ruko. Jahan pe apan scroll down karte hai na. Haan, wohi baat hai na. Jo scroll down karne wali line hoti hai. Uske bagal mein dekho na sir right side mein past lead dikha raha hai green colour mein, buyer profile likha hai, balance likha hai.
Customer: Past transactions karke kuch dikha raha hai udhar hi.
Executive: Past transaction aap upar dekh rahe ho, main aapse bol rahi hu aap neeche dekho.
Executive: By lead ke just neeche hi dekhoge na aap.
Executive: Nahi aa raha hai samajh mein aap main meeting ek minute rukiye aap video meet pe aa jaaiye.
Customer: Ek minute aaiye aur ek achha, ek bar aa jaaiye na please.
Executive: Video meet join kariye sir, maine mail pe bheja hai link.
Customer: Bheja hai kya ek minute. Marathi rakha hai. Kaunsa wala mail pe bheja aapne?
Executive: Anupam Santra wala.
Customer: Anupam Santra wala.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know weekly lead consumption and balance.



Resolution:

- Executive tried guiding to check balance.

- Executive asked to join video meet.



Next Steps: 

- Executive sent a meeting link on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, balance, video meet
